title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2058/88 of 8 July 1988 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on footwear with outer soles of rubber, plastics, leather or composition leather and uppers of leather, falling within CN code 6403, originating in India to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3635/87 apply
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2058/88
of 8 July 1988
re-establishing the levying of customs duties on footwear with outer soles of rubber, plastics, leather or composition leather and uppers of leather, falling within CN code 6403, originating in India to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3635/87 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
As from 15 July 1988, the levying of customs duties, suspended pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 3635/87 shall be re-established on imports into the Community of the following products originating in:
1.2.3 //  //  //  // Order No  // CN code   // Description  //  //  //  // 10.0670   // 6403 (*) (**)   // Footwear with outer soles of rubber, plastics, leather or composition leather and uppers of leather   //    //   //

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 July 1988.
For the Commission
COCKFIELD
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 350, 12. 12. 1987, p. 1.
